{
    "name": "C-metric with a charged, rotating black hole",
    "abbrev": "cmetric",
    "description": "A solution of the Einstein-Maxwell equations, representing a charged, rotating black hole, and its ergosphere, in a stationary, axisymmetric spacetime.",
    "defined": true,
    "derived": false,
    "signature": [-1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0],
    "dimensions": 4,
    "charts": [
        {
            "chartName": "Boyajian-Lightman",
            "xlineElement": "ds² = (1 - 2Mr/\r² - 2Qr/\r²) dt² + (1 - 2Mr/\r² - 2Qr/\r²) dr² + \r²(dθ² + sin²θ dφ²) - Δr² \r² dt²/(1 - 2Mr/\r² - 2Qr/\r²)",
            "validated": false,
        }
    ],
    "desiredProperties": ["christoffels", "ricci", "riemann", "einstein", "weyl", "g00", "infiniteRedShift", "horizons", "singularities", "limits"]
}[0m
